Me and my Wife's journey to become parents started in Feb, we rushed to nearest Gynecologist i.e. Nanda hospital Chhaterpur. Doctors in that hospital are really
good but we wanted someone that could provide us help and guidance in this journey off the clinic/hospital too whenever we are in need. I was really worried about
it and then I used Practo to find nearest gynecologist and shortlisted two but chose Dr. Sutopa due to her details and patient feedback. Obviosly not all feedbacks
are good but lets be honest one or two reviews doesn't help you pick or drop.

So we visited her then she explained things very nicely, we didn't have to ask her anything, it is like with her experience of more than 2 decades she know what 
could be the psyche of patient and what are their most probable concerns. With her first consulation we were happy but going forward I saw that she is writing many 
tests at every stage and also used to prescribe many medicines, at this stage you might discuss this with your friends and family, some of them surely will say this 
doctor is doing this for monetary benefit blah blah but trust me you need to TRUST Dr. Banerjee because this is what we did at every stage.

Like most of the people we also wanted Normal delivery but we will be honest we did not have too much confidence because my wife's pain threshold is very low and when 
due date was nearing we used to discuss this to make up our mind so that when time comes we don't get nervous or demotivated. We discussed this with doctor and she told us
we can decide if we want but we will wait till 40 weeks for normal delivery unless there is any complication found, and at this point i would like to highlight that she has
no agenda other than making sure Mother and Child both are safe and healthy. So if takes to write multiple tests or to prescribe medicines for mother, that looks
money making agenda to some people, she will do that. She is really SOFT SPOKEN and KIND but she wont let you take her lightly when comes to patient care. 

After waiting for 34 weeks there was Preterm labor and we were not happy because that means Mother and baby both will have to suffer but Dr. Sutopa made it go away
with immediate hospitalization of my wife and 2days of care, by the way she operates and delivers baby in Fortis hospital Vasant Kunj. And after waiting 3 more
weeks i.e. in 37 weeks 4days time came and we reached hospital and she saw my wife in labor and she knew about her pain threshold so she prescribed Epidural to ease with labor
but did not chose to do C-Section and with all these we saw our beautiful Girl Child and we were too happy as our WISH came TRUE.

With above story of more than 37 Weeks I would like to Suggest to try Dr. Sutopa Banerjee. Complete Care of Women with Warmth, Kindness.

Also Staff at her clinic are also very nice, kind and Friendly.
